description: This table contains the audit trail for transplant phase, including changes from phase history as well as editing in transplant info section.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PHASE_HX_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the audit trail for transplant episode phase updates.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Referral


Evaluation


Waitlist


Admitted for Transplant


Transplanted

columns.name: DATE_HX_AUDIT_DT
columns.description: Stores the audit trail for transplant episode status date updates.

columns.name: STATUS_HX_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the audit trail for transplant episode status updates.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Internal Hold


Declined


Approved


Removed


Denied Follow-up


Denied Not Followed


Inactive


Deferred


Deferred Follow-up


Deferred Not Followed


Ineligible


Ready for Committee


Ready for Listing


Approved for Listing


Approved for Live Donor Only


Active Follow-up


Reporting Follow-up Only


Not Followed

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_AUDIT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the audit trail for the users who update the phase history in both Phase History activity and Transplant Information section.

columns.name: UPDATE_INST_AUD_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the audit trail for the instant when the transplant phase history is updated in both Phase History activity and Transplant Information section.

columns.name: REASON_HX_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the audit trail of the reasons the transplant episode status was updated.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Died


Unable to Contact Patient


Financial/Insurance Complications


Patient Choice


Not a Candidate


Graft Lost


Other


Candidate Listed in Error


Program Inactive for 2+ Years


Transplanted in Another Country


Candidate Workup Incomplete


Substance Abuse


Medical Non-Compliance


Refused Transplant


Temporarily too Sick


Temporarily too Well


Transplant Pending


Weight Issues


Candidate for Living Donor Transplant Only


Physician/Surgeon Unavailable


Transferred to Another Center


Patient Died During Transplant Procedure


Candidate Condition Improved, Transplant Not Needed


Candidate Condition Deteriorated, too Sick for Transplant


Transplanted at Another Center


Candidate Listed for Unacceptable Antigens Only


Patient Lost to Follow-up


Referred too Early


Patient Cancellation


Patient No Show


Does Not Meet Criteria


Pending Additional Tests


Pending Insurance Approval


Ready for Scheduling


Scheduled for Evaluation


Ready for Committee


Ready for Listing


Followed Up at Another Location

columns.name: PHASE_AUD_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the audit trail for if data was added, edited, or removed from the transplant episode's phase, status, reason, and/or date.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Added


Removed


Automatically Added
